July 27, 2025 
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am writing to express my interest in the Senior Software Engineer position at your 
organization. With over 2 years of experience in backend development, distributed 
systems, and production-grade microservices, I am excited by the opportunity to 
contribute to a product delivery team focused on innovation, performance, and

scalability. 
In my current role at Go Digit Life Insurance, I have designed and delivered resilient 
microservices using Java, Spring Boot, and PostgreSQL, supporting high availability 
and low-latency requirements. I also developed a Kafka-based event processing pipeline 
that handles over 500K messages/day with 99.9% reliability. I actively monitor system 
health using Prometheus and Grafana, and implemented automated runbooks and

alerting workflows, reducing incident resolution time by 60%. 
Beyond backend expertise, I’ve worked on building and maintaining frontend 
components using Angular, with a focus on usability and performance. My experience 
with OAuth 2.0 and secure authentication flows ensures that I can develop robust, user-
safe systems end to end. 
I’ve also led sprint planning, conducted detailed code reviews, and mentored junior

engineers to uphold engineering best practices. My ability to identify technical debt, 
propose improvement strategies, and take ownership of production issues aligns well 
with your team's goals. In addition, I have experience containerizing applications with 
Docker and deploying services in Kubernetes environments, further enabling scalability 
and reliability. 
What draws me most to this opportunity is the balance between technical ownership

and team collaboration—contributing to architectural discussions, refining 
implementation details, and delivering secure, high-performance features. 
I would welcome the chance to contribute to your mission-driven engineering culture 
and bring in my skills to improve product delivery and operational excellence. Thank 
you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to speak with you 
further. 
Sincerely, 
Rohit Kumar
